item.title: More Secure than Yesterday â€“ Preventing "Session stealing" type of attacks.
item.author: thespamtrapp@gmail.com (Serban Balamaci)
item.description: Explaining Session Fixation attack The session fixation type of attack is very simple to understand and relies on the fact that the attacker convinces a victim to use a session already fixated(provided) by the attacker to your site.
